thread.title: Interview: Kurt Cavano on "the Uberfication of everything"
thread.title_full: Interview: Kurt Cavano on "the Uberfication of everything"

title: Interview: Kurt Cavano on "the Uberfication of everything"
text: Interview: Kurt Cavano on “the Uberfication of everything” By Leonie Barrie | 26   Easy access to cheap capital, infinite computing power, and "the Uberfication of everything" are converging to create a perfect storm of disruption that's already starting to shake up the apparel retail industry, according to Kurt Cavano, founder and chief strategy officer of cloud-based supply chain platform GT Nexus.
